name: CategoryTheory.Limits.piObjIso_hom_comp_π
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} D
α : Type w
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasLimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Discrete α) C
f : α → CategoryTheory.Functor D C
d : D
s : α
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.piObjIso f d).hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.Pi.π (fun s => (f s).obj d) s)) ((CategoryTheory.Limits.Pi.π f s).app d)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem piObjIso_hom_comp_π (f : α → D ⥤ C) (d : D) (s : α) :
    (piObjIso f d).hom ≫ Pi.π (fun s => (f s).obj d) s = (Pi.π f s).app d := by
  simp [piObjIso]

name: CategoryTheory.Limits.ι_comp_sigmaObjIso_hom_assoc
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
D : Type u₁
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v₁, u₁} D
α : Type w
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasColimitsOfShape (CategoryTheory.Discrete α) C
f : α → CategoryTheory.Functor D C
d : D
s : α
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.Limits.sigmaObj fun s => (f s).obj d) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.Limits.Sigma.ι f s).app d) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.sigmaObjIso f d).hom h)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Limits.Sigma.ι (fun s => (f s).obj d) s) h)
decl:
@[reassoc (attr := simp)]
theorem ι_comp_sigmaObjIso_hom (f : α → D ⥤ C) (d : D) (s : α) :
    (Sigma.ι f s).app d ≫ (sigmaObjIso f d).hom = Sigma.ι (fun s => (f s).obj d) s := by
  simp [sigmaObjIso]
